programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau

programme.title: Yr Whws

programme.title: Awyr Iach

programme.title: Sion y Chef

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Guto ishe gwybod o ble mae mefus yn dod. Felly mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd ag ef i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddo. Guto wants to know where strawberries come from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Llywelyn, ci'r garddwr, wedi colli ei asgwrn ac wrth dyllu amdano mae'n disgyn i fyd y tyrchod! When Llywelyn the dog starts to burrow for his bone, he falls into the moles' world!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Jini eisiau pen-blwydd ei mam fod yn berffaith, ond gall yr amherffaith fod yn ddigon da? Jini wants her mother's birthday celebrations to be perfect, but can imperfect be good enough?

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn mae'r daith yn mynd i'r mor i gwrdd a Cheffyl y mor ac i ben y coed i gwrdd a'r Gibon. We journey under the sea to meet the Sea Horse and up into the trees to find the Gibbon.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'r cwn yn mynd ar eu gwyliau i fferm Gorllewin Gwyllt Mr Whilber. Ond mae Euryn Peryglus wedi mynd efo nhw. The pups are going on holiday to Mr Whilber's Wild West farm!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Ysgol Trelyn sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Trelyn join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Nl i'r Gwersyll
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Gwersyll yr Urdd Llangrannog wedi'i drawsnewid i groesawu gwersyllwyr i brofi penwythnos yn y 50au. Campers visit a transformed Llangrannog - and step back into the 50s.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Meinir ym Mhant y Wennol i gynghori ar ail-wampio rhan o'r ardd. Adam is in the Cross Hands community garden, while Sioned reveals top tips for Spring colour.

programme.title: Cynefin

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Rydym yn Abertawe i nodi 80 mlynedd ers VE Day. Cawn rannu atgofion am yr Ail Ryfel Byd a mwynhau canu mawl dyrchafol o addoldai ledled Cymru. We mark the 80th anniversary of VE Day.

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen olaf, mae Iolo yn edrych ar effaith cynhesu byd-eang ar fywyd gwyllt. In the final episode, Iolo looks at the effects of global warming on wildlife.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Cyfres omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Glyn Ebwy v Casnewydd
programme.desc: Gemau rygbi byw. Live rugby games.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Gyda Peter wedi colli rheolaeth, mae'n rhaid cymryd camau eithafol er mwyn ceisio ei stopio. With Peter out of control, extreme measures must be taken to try to stop him.

programme.desc: Stori am sut wnaeth Heddlu De Cymru ddefnyddio technegau fforensig er mwyn darganfod gang troseddol peryglus. South Wales Police use forensic investigation to catch an organised crime group.

programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, a phan mae o'n hapus mae o'n hoffi fflapio ei freichiau. Palo flaps so much that he flies away and the Book Animals have to track him down.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'n heulog ar y traeth heddiw, a phawb angen oeri ychydig. It's sunny on the beach today, and everyone needs to cool off somewhat.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Taid yn prynu tocynnau i fynd Stiw ac Elsi ar reid mewn balwn aer poeth, ac yn helpu Stiw i beidio bod ofn uchder. Taid gets Stiw and Elsi tickets for a hot-air balloon ride.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad ag Ynys Enlli, antur feicio gyda'r teulu ger Llys y Fran, a cwrdd merch o'r enw Enlli a'i chwn defaid. Join Meleri and Huw on all sorts of adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cn i helpu plant bach ymgyfarwyddo gyda wyneb cloc a dweud yr amser. A song to help youngsters familiarise themselves with a clock face, and how to tell the time.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch yn hoff iawn o wneud posau, ond nid yw bob amser yn gallu eu datrys - hynny yw, tan bod swyn arbennig yn ei helpu. A spell helps Twm Twrch solve some complicated puzzles!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop

programme.title: Border Incident
programme.desc: 1949. Thriller. Directed by Anthony Mann. Stars Ricardo Montalban, George Murphy & Howard Da Silva. Two agents go undercover to stop the smuggling of Mexican migrant workers into California. [S]

programme.title: Open Fire
programme.desc: 1994. Crime. Directed by Paul Greengrass. Stars Rupert Graves, Kate Hardie & Jim Carter. A compelling drama capturing the life of one of Britain's most wanted men during the 1980s - David Martin. [S]

programme.title: The Food of the Gods
programme.desc: 1976. Horror. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Marjoe Gortner, Pamela Franklin & Ralph Meeker. A remote island is taken over by gigantic beasts after the appearance of a strange, edible ooze. [S]

programme.title: Hook, Line and Sinker
programme.desc: This short film made in the 1950s or early 1960s covers the maiden voyage of the 'Glenstruan', a great line fishing vessel from Aberdeen, to within the Arctic Circle and back again.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: 21st Anniversary Programme. 1981. Skate fishing, traction engines, gun dogs and a dancing horse all feature in this special compilation celebrating '21 years of gossiping about the countryside'. [S]

programme.title: Frozen Alive
programme.desc: 1964. Sci-Fi. Directed by Bernard Knowles. Mark Stevens, Marianne Koch & Wolfgang Lukschy. A scientist experimenting with suspended animation decides to use himself as a test subject. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy Vs Cueball
programme.desc: 1946. Thriller. Director: Gordon Douglas. Stars Morgan Conway, Dick Wessel & Esther Howard. Dick Tracy is on the trail of the rampaging arch nemesis, Cueball. [S]

programme.title: Jesse James Meets Frankenstein's Daughter
programme.desc: 1966. Western. Directed by William Beaudine. Stars John Lupton & Narda Onyx. Jesse James and his henchman wind up in the hands of Maria Frankenstein whilst on the run. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: No Place Like Home. 1962. Stars Donna Douglas, Bea Benaderet & Frank Wilcox. Back home for Christmas, Elly May bonds with her old animal friends, while Pearl tries to impress Mr. Brewster. [S]

programme.title: BFI: A Message From Mars
programme.desc: 1913. Sci-Fi. Director: J. Wallett Waller. The first silent British sci-fi feature (with new score). A Martian visits earth to cure a selfish man (similar to 'A Christmas Carol') on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Coach Travellers in 1965
programme.desc: 1965. Directed by Brigit Barry. A short promotional film about travel by coach, with a cross section of passengers who explain why they prefer coaches to other methods of travel.

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge
programme.desc: A Home Fit for Scarecrows. 1979. Stars Jon Pertwee, Charlotte Coleman & Norman Bird. When furniture goes missing from the farmhouse and village, the children suspect Worzel could be the culprit. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Hizzonner the Penguin. 1966. Stars Adam West & Burgess Meredith. Suspiciously endearing himself to the citizens of Gotham by foiling a robbery, the Penguin announces he is running for mayor. [S]

programme.title: Spaceways
programme.desc: 1953. Sci-fi. Directed by Terence Fisher. Stars Howard Duff, Eva Bartok & Alan Wheatley. When a test launch of a satellite fails, two people attached to the secret project mysteriously go missing. [S]

programme.title: Twist or Stick
programme.desc: It's a 1960s twisting compilation see 'The Hollies' Shane Fenton & The Fentones, The Orchids, The Keytones, a lot of 'That Old Yeah, Yeah Feeling' and much more.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Reluctant Rebel. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Leslie Phillips & John Carson. Sir Geoffrey and his servant disguise themselves as outlaws and join Robin's gang to get some insight for a journal. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Market Day/Minnow Trap/Lobster Boat. 1986. Jack Hargreaves goes shopping at a country market and catches small fish in the nearby stream, before heading out to sea on a lobster trawler. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We take a trip to London in the 30s and spend a Sunday by the sea in the 50s. There's film magic and memory joggers with Merry Maids and bus signs, and we pay tribute to our friend Brian Murphy. [S]

programme.title: The Wicked Lady
programme.desc: 1945. Drama. Directed by Leslie Arliss. Stars Margaret Lockwood, Griffith Jones & James Mason. 17th Century beauty Barbara Worth leads a double life to relieve her boredom. [S]

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: A Perfect Crime. Stars John Gregson, Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. A stockbroker and safe-cracker join forces to pull jobs in wealthy homes. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 25. 1975. Julie Rogers performs 'My World Gets Smaller Every Day', and Wild Honey perform 'I Can't Leave You Alone'. Plus, Dustin Gee, Ronnie Dukes and Ricki Lee star. [S]

programme.title: The Silent Partner
programme.desc: 1978. Thriller. Director: Daryl Duke. Stars: Elliott Gould, Susannah York, Christopher Plummer, John Candy. A bank teller skims $50,000 during a robbery, but the crook wants it back. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Dreaming of Thee. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie's 3 weeks from release from prison with time off for good behaviour. However, Charles Endell visits him on visiting day. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Dreaming of Thee. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie's 3 weeks from release from prison with time off for good behaviour. However, Charles Endell visits him on visiting day. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: Hannibal Brooks
programme.desc: 1969. War. Directed by Michael Winner. Stars Oliver Reed, John Alderton & Wolfgang Preiss. A POW working at a zoo gets the chance to escape and takes the elephant he's been caring for with him. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout May. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Queue for Gardens
programme.desc: 1968. A delightful trip to Kew Gardens and to Syon Park on the opposite side of the river.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Blood Money. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Ralph Meeker & Robert J. Wilke. Longley stumbles across a cabin, and its dead owner, and is accused by the dead man's brothers of being the killer. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Strained Relations. 1963. Stars David Kossoff, David Jackson & Robert Easton. The Larkins receive news that Jeff is flying in for Christmas and an ulcer hinders Alf's plans to drink heavily. [S]

programme.title: The Sicilians
programme.desc: 1964. Crime. Stars Robert Hutton, Reginald Marsh & Ursula Howells. An aide at the U.S. Embassy finds himself involved with Scotland Yard and the French police after a mafia boss' son is kidnapped. [S]

programme.title: Park Plaza 605
programme.desc: 1953. Crime drama directed by Bernard Knowles. A private detective solves a murder, which he was accused of. Starring Tom Conway, Eva Bartok and Sid James. [S]

programme.title: Kill Me Tomorrow
programme.desc: 1957. Directed by Terence Fisher. Starring Tommy Steele & Pat O'Brien. Crosbie is sacked, but needs his job to fund an operation for his son, only to find his old editor has been murdered. [S]

programme.title: Bombay Waterfront
programme.desc: 1952. Directed by Maclean Rogers and starring John Bentley, Patricia Dainton and Peter Gawthorne. Follows Temple's efforts to aid the police in solving a series of gruesome murders. [S]

programme.title: The Steel Key

programme.title: The Quiet Woman
programme.desc: 1951. Crime drama directed By John Gilling and starring Derek Bond, Jane Hylton and Dora Bryan. A proprietress of a country inn becomes involved with smugglers. [S]

programme.title: Powderkeg

programme.title: Spring and Port Wine

programme.desc: Fluffy Dessert: The clouds are so airy, so similar to different sweets and, are probably, very tasty! Masha and the Bear decide to take to the skies and try the airy dessert. (S6 Ep16)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Collection Passion: Rosie has a herbarium. Bear has a collection of rare stamps. And what does Masha have? Masha also wants to collect something, but she just can't figure out what exactly. (S6 Ep17)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Be in the Pink!: Oh no! The baby is sick! Rosie the Pig has developed an incomprehensible rash after falling into a nettle bush. (S6 Ep18)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: A Pineapple of Discord: The Wolves find someone's pineapple in the forest. The temptation to eat it is stronger than the desire to find the real owner, until Masha appears at their table. (S6 Ep19)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Where Did it Goat?: The Bear and the other forest inhabitants are puzzled: huge circles have appeared in the field near the forest. Moreover, Masha's Goat has disappeared! (S6 Ep20)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Nap Time! / Princess Baby Born: Emma and Eva are in the middle of an amazing make-believe adventure when Conrad ruins it by telling them they have to take a nap. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Rainy Day / Playdate: Emma's pretending to be Lucky Dog by wearing her rainboots on her hands. Eva comes over to play with Emma but she refuses to take out her dummy. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Mustard's Messed-up Birthday: Today is Mustard's birthday, and the MiniWhats are trying to figure out what to get him. Ollie draws him a gigantic skateboard ramp. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Sad Announcer: The MiniWhats are bored because they're not allowed to spend as much time on their tablets as they would like. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Sunburn: It's very hot outside, so Ollie draws a fan. It blows away Pamela and Raoul's hat. They set off to find the hat and are chased by a Sunburn, a gigantic monster. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: A Lively Afternoon: While preparing for a fossil hunt in the mountains, a heavy downpour forces Billy, JC and Suzie to stay inside the ranch. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Jack Is Sick: Jack has got a nasty cold. Billy, Suzie and JC agree to take care of him and get him back on his feet. Billy and Suzie go to pick wild plants to concoct a remedy for him. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Billy's Mum: Billy stumbles upon a mysterious letter in the attic of the ranch. Although the envelope says "For Billy, to open on your 10th birthday", he can't resist and opens it. (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cops and Robbers: When Chrissy takes a game of cops and robbers a bit too seriously, Cory resolves to save his sister from a life of crime! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Superhero School: Only a true hero can pass all the challenges that Cory and Freddie invent to test Chrissy's superhero abilities. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bored Games: When the TV suddenly stops working, the Carsons discover an even better way to entertain themselves. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Show and Tell: Cory frantically scours the Carson house in search of the world's coolest item to bring in for show and tell. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Teen Monster Truck: Cory is super excited to watch the Baby Unicar movie, until he discovers all the cool kids are watching Teen Monster Truck. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Karen: Cory's friends join him on a desperate search through Bumperton Hills when his unlikely playmate goes missing! (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Newton's Discovery: Newton's powers have been neutralised because of Romeo's blockade of the asteroids. (S5 Ep45)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Romeo's Pirate Trap: Pirate Robot wants to upgrade his ship - with stuff from the Flying Factory. (S5 Ep46)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna's Moon Attack: Luna secretly steals Motsuki's teleport power. Gekko and Catboy investigate, but mess up with catastrophic results - can they put it right? (S5 Ep47)

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Mighty Dino Mites: When Blitz's favorite stuffy goes missing, the dino mites team up to track down the culprit and save the day. (S2 Ep17)

programme.desc: Calling All Riders!: The Cassidys and Tinhorns face off in a race, but it's only through learning to work together that they're able to finish the race. (S1 Ep45)
